headline: Vance works to lock up Ohio GOP Senate race as Trump-averse candidate rises
sentences:

In a Trafalgar Group poll released Monday, 26 percent of likely GOP primary voters said they planned to vote for Vance, followed by 22 percent for Dolan and 21 percent for Mandel.
